api_data.job_title: Opening for Receptionist or Front Office Executive in Marol

jd_information.description: The candidate should be very well versed in English and be well groomed as required in hospitality industry.She will be attending phone calls,greeting the customers,and do all the jobs required for a receptionist.Job description:Interested candidates can forward their resume on the below ID:hrinida@cozmotravel.com
